name: Turbo Winds v1.5.9
description:
-On a mission to save your captured team mate.

-The Turbo Winds Pilot’s ships have been sabotaged!!

-The whole crew has been destroyed, so you need to fix your ship and get back into action as so as possible!

If you are a fan of shoot’em up space games like Space shooter and you’re looking for a short story game, then Turbo winds is the game for you! Get ready to blast your way through enemy lines, fight bosses and upgrade your weapons and powerups. Can you clear each level and save Onyx?!

Features

  • -Shoot’em up: Choose your ships, charge in and destroy some aliens!
  • -Huge Bosses: Face big bosses head to head and take them down!
  • -Unlock and Upgrade: Unlock new ships and upgrade your powerups!

HOW TO PLAY

Drag your fingers to control your ship and dodge enemy bullets.

Use coins and gems to upgrade.

Use powerups to get through difficult levels.

CREDITS

Space Shooter Game GUI by Craftpix.net

Ships by BizmasterStudios

Music by OBLIDIVM http://oblidivmmusic.blogspot.com.es/
